name: FortuneTellerZoltar
0:
”Alexa, ask Fortune Teller What is my fortune?”
”When will I find true love?”
”Will I get that new job?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fortune teller
des:
Will you find love? Will you get that new job? When will you finally get the raise you have worked so hard for? Ask Zoltar! He will share all his wisdom with you. He is considerate, motivational and witty. Sometimes he makes you think for yourself because he believes that you are special and unique.

Zoltar will listen to your question and tap the energy in the universe to answer. It is fun and entertaining to read the future. Zoltar will try to help but, for the right direction and the real answer, listen to your own wisdom and heart. Everyone must learn to listen your own inner voice to make decisions.

Remember always that you are unique, and you have talents and energy that only you have. The answers are all there. We hope you enjoy asking questions and hearing answers!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
